childMarkdownRemark.html:
panke.gallery's participation at Performing Arts Festival 2019:
4 Performances and one Installation with Lisa Dreykluft, Bryana Fritz, Martin Kohout, Ioana Vreme Moser and Igor Stromajer from 29 May to 31 May.

Once more, we take part at this year's Performing Arts Festival Berlin

Wednesday to Friday, the installation of Martin Kohout's NetArtActivity from April 2010 to March 2011 will be on show from 15:00 to 19:00. The Installation will be used to archive and preserve this work with the <archiving.netart> method.

Furthermore we will present each day a performance at 17.00 featuring Bryana Fritz, Ioana Vreme Moser, Igor Stromajer and Lisa Dreykluft. Further information can be found below.

Installation Watching Martin Kohout (2010/2011) by Martin Kohout

Wednesday until Friday 12:00 – 17:00

Indispensible Blue (offline) – A Desktop Dance Performance by Bryana Fritz

Wednesday, 29 May 2019 at 17:00

Indispensible Blue is an offline dance as well as a desktop poem. It is a title that has hosted multiple inquiries – performance, screenshot recordings, writings – around the question of what might be a poetics of usership. It is a desktop dance evading the choreographic clutch of the user interface. It is a poem burrowing in the folders unfolding.

Here, it is a performance
on her personal computer
in the dark
desktop projected on wall
dancing cursor
opening folders
shattering a poem
“wait for me at the bottom of the pool”

— j.s.

Coquetta / sound performance 2018 by Ioana Vreme Moser

Thursday, 30 May 2019 at 17:00

Coquetta flourishes in a sardonic cosmetic beautifying ritual, amongst dandizectric’ discords and modified ‘pink-taxed’ items. The desired flawless looks unveil their poisonous essence; lead and arsenic being one of the all-time favourite chemical compounds used in makeup. The step-by-step body preparation occurs as a rhythmical daily toilette routine. Hair combing, moisturizing, scrubbing, eyelash curling, eye-shadowing, powder-puffing, lipstick application, and other sounding manoeuvres get chiselled by control voltages. The buzzes of the body appearance altering devices blend inside of the to-go wig boxes and other flirtatious velvet gizmos soldered merely from trash finds.

UnFollow me! proto-performance by Igor Štromajer

Thursday, 30 May 2019 at 18:00

Watch out for false artists. They come to you in artists‘ clothing, but inwardly they are lifeless algorithms.
– Mathview 7:15

A Séance: how to open up your very own online shop (very easy) by Lisa Dreykluft

Friday, 31 May 2019 at 17:00

“Hello everyone it’s me with another life hack. Today I wanna show you how to open up your very own online shop. We’re gonna do some internet browsing and it’s all very simple and a good way to make some extra “money”/escape “precarity”. Tune in for more I’m excited to see you all soon bye! 😊”

The workshop will be in English. Please bring your own laptop and sign up until 26 May, 6pm. Number of participants: 12 max.
